start_message:
Hi {first_name}, welcome to the Restaurant Management Bot!

Use /help to see the full list of commands.

help_menu.title: Welcome to the Restaurant Management Bot!

commands.start: /start - Show this welcome message and command list
commands.pending_reservations: /pending_reservations - Manually check for any pending reservations that have not yet been notified.
commands.language: /language - Change your language preference (/pt for Portuguese, /en for English)

unauthorized: Unauthorized: This bot is for authorized restaurant administrators only.
unauthorized_detailed:
⚠️ This bot is for authorized restaurant administrators only.

If you're an admin, please:
1. Log into your admin dashboard
2. Go to Settings → Telegram Integration
3. Generate and scan a QR code to link your account
link_success: 🎉 Your Telegram account has been linked successfully! You'll now receive reservation notifications here.
link_expired: ❌ This link has expired or is already used. Please generate a new QR code from your admin dashboard.
linking_instructions:
👋 Welcome to the Restaurant Manager Bot!

To link your admin account:
1. Go to your admin dashboard
2. Navigate to Settings
3. Generate a QR code in the Telegram section
4. Scan the QR code or click the link

If you're already an admin and having issues, please contact support.
no_restaurant_associated: Your admin account is not associated with a restaurant. Please contact support.
restaurant_not_found: Could not find the restaurant associated with your account. Please contact support.

pending_reservations.title: Pending Reservations for {restaurant_name}:
pending_reservations.no_reservations: There are no new pending reservations for {restaurant_name} that have not yet been notified.

language_changed: ✅ Language changed to English! All future messages will be in English.
language_info:
🌐 Current language: English

To change language, use:
/en - English
/pt - Português
language_invalid: ❌ Invalid language command. Use /en for English or /pt for Portuguese.
